metadata.title: CVE-2023-38336 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: netkit-rcp in rsh-client 0.17-24 allows command injection via filenamesbecause /bin/sh is used by susystem, a related issue to CVE-2006-0225,CVE-2019-7283, and CVE-2020-15778.

criterions.comment: netkit-rsh: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
